name: big-pearl
short_effect: Sell for 3750 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 7500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A lovely large pearl that would sell at a high price.
flavor_text.emerald: A lovely large pearl that would sell at a high price.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price.
